derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: modern Latin, from con- 'together with' + dominium 'right of ownership' (see dominion). Sense 2 dates from the 1960s

entry.tran: (每一套公寓归居住者所有的)公寓楼
entry.def: A condominium is an apartment building in which each apartment is owned by the person who lives there.
A condominium is one of the privately owned apartments in a condominium.

means.word_mean: 1. one of the dwelling units in a condominium
2. housing consisting of a complex of dwelling units (as an apartment house) in which each unit is individually owned
